text.section:
This section does not apply to:
a charitable solicitation by an accredited school, college, or university to its students, former students, parents of students or former students, board members, or staff; or
a formal grant application prepared for and submitted to a specific corporation or foundation.

section.section: A charitable solicitation that is a specific written request to the public for a charitable contribution shall contain a disclosure statement.
A written receipt for a charitable contribution shall contain a disclosure statement.

text.section: The disclosure statement shall be displayed conspicuously on a charitable solicitation and on a receipt for a charitable contribution.
